refnamediv.refpurpose: Query the Zeitgeist Data-Source Registry extension

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The Zeitgeist engine maintains a publicly available list of recognized data-sources (components inserting information into Zeitgeist). ZeitgeistDataSourceRegistry is used to register new data sources, get information about them and gives the ability to enable or disable the data sources.

entry.para: callback to call when the request is satisfied.
the data to pass to _callback_ function.
location to store the error occurring, or NULL to ignore

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistDataSourceRegistry
refsect2.para: Query the Zeitgeist Data-Source Registry extension

The Zeitgeist engine maintains a publicly available list of recognized data-sources (components inserting information into Zeitgeist). ZeitgeistDataSourceRegistry is used to register new data sources, get information about them and gives the ability to enable or disable the data sources.

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistDataSourceRegistryClass
refsect2.para: The class structure for ZEITGEIST_TYPE_DATA_SOURCE_REGISTRY. All the fields in this structure are private and should never be accessed directly.

refsect2.title: struct ZeitgeistRemoteRegistryIface

entry.para: asynchronous finish function for get_data_sources, called by zeitgeist_remote_registry_get_data_sources()
asynchronous finish function for register_data_source, called by zeitgeist_remote_registry_register_data_source()
asynchronous finish function for set_data_source_enabled, called by zeitgeist_remote_registry_set_data_source_enabled()
asynchronous finish function for get_data_source_from_id, called by zeitgeist_remote_registry_get_data_source_from_id()
the ZeitgeistDataSourceRegistry instance that received the signal

entry.simpara: user data set when the signal handler was connected.
